titleStmt.title: A Briefe relation of certain speciall and most materiall passages, and speeches in the Starre-Chamber, occasioned and delivered Iune the 14th. 1637. at the censure of those three worthy gentlemen, Dr. Bastwicke, Mr. Burton and Mr. Prynne, as it hath beene truely and faithfully gathered from their owne mouthes by one present at the sayd censure..

notesStmt.note: Name and place of publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
The execution of the censure, June 30, 1637, is related on p. 16-30.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
